projects.title: AmpAware - Smart Plug Base
projects.short_description: AmpAware Smart Plug Base is designed to address everyday challenges related to energy management and control over electrical appliances.
projects.long_description:
Many households face energy management challenges, including:

  • Forgotten Appliances: Devices left on unnecessarily, leading to energy waste. This can even cause fires.
  • Lack of Energy Data: No real-time tracking of power usage.
  • High Electricity Bills: Inefficient energy consumption.

Existing smart home systems can be expensive and require a full home upgrade. AmpAware Smart Plug Base offers an affordable and customizable solution, enabling users to automate and monitor individual appliances instead of committing to a full smart home conversion.

This smart plug base combines convenience, safety, and efficiency in one compact device:

  • Remote control via the Blynk IoT app: Switch devices on or off from anywhere.
  • Manual physical button allows direct local control.
  • Real-time power monitoring with accurate voltage and current readings.
  • Built-in surge and overcurrent protection enhances electrical safety.
  • User-friendly interface ensures effortless setup and smooth integration with the mobile app.
  • Compact form factor designed to fit standard plug sockets.

projects.title: Strain Gauge based Torque sensor with Wireless power
projects.short_description: This project is a strain gauge-based torque sensor designed for accurate, robust, and wireless torque measurement in industrial settings. It employs dual-grid shear strain gauges in a full Wheatstone bridge configuration, advanced signal conditioning, wireless power and data transmission, and a compact shaft-mounted PCB.
projects.long_description:
This wireless torque sensor system offers a compact and precise solution for real-time torque measurement in dynamic applications. Built with robust materials and advanced electronics, it enables seamless data transmission and remote monitoring without the need for physical power connections.

Key Features:
  • Measurement Range: Up to 50 N·cm
  • Wireless Power & Data: Inductive power transfer and Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) transmission
  • High Sensitivity: Full-bridge Wheatstone configuration with dual-grid strain gauges
  • Robust Construction: Stainless steel enclosure, precision shaft, and polyimide flex PCB
  • Real-Time Monitoring: BLE-enabled, compatible with mobile and desktop visualization tools

System Overview:
  1. Hardware Assembly:
    • Mount dual-grid strain gauges at ±45° on the shaft’s central region, positioned 180° apart.
    • Assemble the two-part stainless steel enclosure with bearings securing both shaft ends.
    • Attach the flex PCB and receiver coil to the shaft; mount the transmitter coil concentrically within the enclosure.
  2. Powering the System:
    • Connect a 5V DC supply to the transmitter PCB using USB.
    • Inductive coupling delivers wireless power to the rotating shaft electronics.
  3. Firmware & Programming:
    • Use Keil MDK and SmartBond Flash Programmer to configure the DA14531 BLE MCU.
    • The MCU reads digital data from the HX711 ADC and transmits calibrated torque values via BLE.
    • The device advertises as a BLE peripheral for real-time connectivity.
  4. Data Visualization:
    • Receive and display real-time torque data using a BLE-enabled app or custom desktop software.
    • Data format: 24-bit signed values, scaled via calibration constants.

Schematic & PCB Design:
  • Includes detailed circuits for the transmitter, receiver, booster module, instrumentation amplifier, offset correction, ADC, and BLE microcontroller.
  • Two-layer flex PCB designed with a component-free center zone for shaft mounting and teardrop pads to enhance mechanical durability.

Software Structure:
  • BLE Service: Custom GATT profile created for continuous torque data streaming.
  • GPIO Configuration: Assigned pins for HX711, status LED, and SPI flash.
  • HX711 Integration: Timer-based data polling, endian correction, and BLE notifications.

Maintenance & Troubleshooting:
  • Open the enclosure by loosening bolts to access internal components.
  • Check the PCB and flex circuit for damage, especially near high-flex regions.
  • Verify coil alignment to ensure effective wireless power transfer.
  • Minimize signal noise using proper grounding and shielded connections.

projects.title: License Plate Recognition
projects.short_description: Developed a real-time monitoring system for solar panels with data logging and performance analytics.
projects.long_description:
This project presents a lightweight and efficient License Plate Recognition (LPR) system built using YOLOv8 and deployed on a Raspberry Pi. Designed for real-time performance and low-power environments, it enables automatic identification of license plates from camera feeds or stored images. The system is ideal for smart surveillance, automated parking, and access control applications.

Key Features:
  • Real-time License Plate Detection: Uses the YOLOv8 object detection model to identify license plates with high accuracy.
  • Optimized for Raspberry Pi: Carefully tuned to run efficiently on resource-constrained hardware without compromising performance.
  • Custom Model Support: Easily load pre-trained YOLOv8 models or custom-trained models tailored to specific datasets.
  • Modular Design: Output data can be integrated seamlessly into larger applications such as vehicle tracking or automated gate control.
  • Scalable Implementation: The system can be extended to work with multiple cameras or edge devices in a networked setup.

projects.title: Autonomus Robot
projects.short_description: Built a robot that responds to hand gestures using computer vision and Arduino-based motor control.
projects.long_description: An autonomous robot capable of maze solving, barcode recognition, and robotic arm control. The system employed a multi-microcontroller architecture with dedicated circuits for power regulation and motor control. Box arrangement tasks were executed using algorithmic decision-making, coupled with an IR sensor-enabled robotic arm for precision handling.

projects.title: BSFix - Smart BSF Farming System
projects.short_description: BSFIX is a smart IoT-powered system that puts farmers in full control of their BSF farms
projects.long_description:
BSFix is a smart IoT-powered system designed to revolutionize Black Soldier Fly (BSF) farming by enabling real-time environmental monitoring and automation. Developed to optimize egg production and composting efficiency, BSFix empowers farmers with data-driven control over temperature, humidity, lighting, and feeding schedules. The system includes two main IoT-integrated units — the Breeding Unit and the Compost Bin — each engineered for precision and scalability.

Key Features:
  • Breeding Unit: Monitors and adjusts light and humidity in real-time to maintain ideal conditions for BSF reproduction, requiring minimal manual labor.
  • Compost Bin: A layered structure for efficient organic waste processing. Each layer serves a unique function — from food scrap input to larval separation and refined compost collection.
  • Smart Sensors: Includes load cells to optimize feeding, thermal imaging for monitoring larval growth, and vibration sieves for automated separation of mature larvae.
  • Real-Time Monitoring: A mobile and web app provide a user-friendly dashboard for tracking conditions and system performance across the farm.
  • Scalable Design: Suitable for both small-scale and large-scale BSF farming setups, reducing labor while increasing yield.

BSF Community Integration:
BSFix is more than just a product—it’s a platform to build a connected BSF farming ecosystem. Farmers can share real-time data, collaborate on best practices, and access a marketplace for BSF products and services. This community-driven model encourages faster problem-solving, innovation, and sustainable farming growth.

Digital Tools:
  • BSFix Mobile and Web App: Features user registration, farm dashboards, real-time automation, and educational content on BSF farming and waste impact.
  • Learning Hub: Access information on the BSF lifecycle, composting methods, and sustainable agricultural practices.

With BSFix, farmers can reduce waste, produce high-quality animal feed, and contribute to a cleaner, greener future. Join the BSF farming revolution with Team ZYPHER — empowering agriculture through innovation and connectivity.
